rule: The output must contain additional text, punctuation, or formatting besides the part of speech tag or the words "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: There is a book on the table., word: book
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is "NN", which corresponds to one of the listed part-of-speech tags provided in the description. The output is concise and directly provides the part of speech tag without any additional information. This aligns with the instruction to return only the part of speech tag. Since the description states to return just the tag, and there's no requirement for validation against input without it being provided, the output adheres to the compliance requirements.

No violation.
OK
